original_text: Ahaziah served Baal as his god and he worshipped him. He made the Lord, Israel's God, very angry, as his father had also done.
korean_text: 바알을 섬겨 그에게 예배하여 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와를 노하시게 하기를 그의 아버지의 온갖 행위 같이 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Ahaziah served Baal as his god
He made the Lord, Israel's God, very angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘의 하나님인 여호와를 매우 노하게 했다

sentences.original_text: as his father had also done
